name: Cranberry Apple Crumble
ingredients: 3/4 cups each oatmeal and brown sugar
3 2/3 cups granny smith apples (about 4-5 medium apples)
instructions: Stir together oats, brown sugar, flour and cinnamon.
Using fork cut in butter and oil until incorporated.
For the apples peel and thinly slice.
In a bowl toss the apples with lemon juice and zest until well  mixed.
Reserving 1 c. oat mixture for topping, add remaining oat mixture to fruit, tossing to mix well.
Sprinkle reserved oat mix over top.
Bake for 35-45 minutes or until apples are tender.
Serve warm or at room temperature.
